component.name: Debugger
component.file: Debugger.swf (compiled component, needed for publication on internet)
Debugger.xml (configurationfile, needed for publication on internet)
component.description: Debugger for debugging ArcIMSlayers and OGWMSLayers

configtag.name: <fmc:Debugger>
<fmc:Debugger>

attribute.name: listento
listento
attribute.description: Comma seperated list of id's of maplayers. Only ArcIMSLayers and OGWMSLayer will be debugged correctly.

configtag.hierarchy: childnode of <flamingo> or a container component. e.g. <fmc:Window>
